name: BOPPERS BETA
description:
boppers is a 3D & 2D mixture of the popular top down shooter genre
in this you play as the bopper, shooting his way through many enemies and threats trying to end your life

Eliminate them and hopefully find new weapons to use against them in combat,

from quad blasters, lasers, homing guns and big bois, you can eliminate the enemy in a variety of ways

shoot for the highest score you can

my favourite gun is the laser, thanks and have fun
